titleStmt.title: Fryday May 17. 1661. Hactenus Anglorvm nvlli. Carolo Secundo Magno Majori. An ode on the fair weather that attended His Maiesty on his birth, to his kingdom and his Crown. As it was presented to the Kings most Excellent Majesty.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Clowes, for the author,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "Glories of God, the heavens high declare".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
